name: Sweet Polish Sausage
author: Bea Gassman
summary: This is an excellent way to prepare Polish sausage with no hint of greasiness to it!
ingredients: 2 pounds kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
directions: Place sausage in a large saucepan
Add water to cover and simmer over low heat for 1 hour
Drain, remove sausage and set aside
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In the same saucepan combine the Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, onion, sugar, hot pepper sauce and  water
Bring all to a boil, stirring
Place reserved sausage in a 9x13-inch baking dish and cover it with the sauce mixture
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour
